description: STRENGTHENING THE CAPACITY OF VIET NAM UNION OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY ASSOCIATIONS (VUSTA)

subproject.corporate outcome: Support national public administration reform initiatives
subproject.description: Viet Nam Union of Science and Technology Associations’ capacity to represent its member organisations’ interests in government policy-making processes increased; Viet Nam Union of Science and Technology Associations’ internal governance structure and capacity is improved; Viet Nam Union of Science and Technology Association connects its member organisations and reaches out to other stakeholders.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
